project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that calculates the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns in a CSV file based on user input.

task.name: Implement functionality to select numerical columns based on user input
Implement mean calculation for the selected columns
Implement median calculation for the selected columns
Implement mode calculation for the selected columns
Write tests for each of the implemented functions: reading CSV, calculating mean, median, and mode
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure correctness
